name: Easy Baked Mozzarella Sticks
author: Amy
summary: Gooey cheese and rich crescent rolls combine to make an easy snack or accompaniment to a fast pasta dinner. And the whole dish requires only 3 ingredients! Use butter or garlic-flavored crescent rolls.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent roll dough
4 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into 8 slices
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Unroll crescent roll dough on work surface and separate into 4 rectangles, pressing perforations together to seal
Cut each rectangle into 2 smaller rectangles
Place 1 slice of mozzarella cheese on each; roll up tightly and press edges together to seal
Arrange seam side-down on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 11 to 13 minutes
Warm pizza sauce in a small saucepan over medium-low heat, about 5 minutes
Use warmed sauce as a dipping sauce for mozzarella sticks
